trans-unit.source: Allows you to override property, field, and class attributes when you use the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: Permite reemplazar los atributos de las propiedades, campos y clases al utilizar <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> para serializar o deserializar un objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> enables the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override the default way of serializing a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> permite la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para reemplazar el modo predeterminado de serialización de un conjunto de objetos.

trans-unit.source: Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL--even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways.
trans-unit.target: Reemplazar la serialización de este modo tiene dos usos: en primer lugar, puede controlar y aumentar la serialización de los objetos detectados en una DLL, incluso si no tiene acceso al origen; en segundo lugar, puede crear un conjunto de clases serializables, pero serializar los objetos de varias maneras.

trans-unit.source: For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, en lugar de serializar los miembros de una instancia de clase como elementos XML, puede serializar ellos como atributos XML, lo que causará un documento más eficaz para el transporte.

trans-unit.source: After you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object, you pass it as an argument to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Después de crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto, que se pasa como argumento a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the data contained by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> to override attributes that control how objects are serialized.
trans-unit.target: Resultante <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> utiliza los datos contenidos en el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> para reemplazar los atributos que controlan cómo se serializan los objetos.

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object associated with each overridden object type.
trans-unit.target: Para lograr esto, la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> contiene una colección de los tipos de objeto que se reemplazan, así como un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto asociado a cada tipo de objeto reemplazado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object itself contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> propio objeto contiene un conjunto apropiado de objetos de atributos que controlan cómo se serializa cada campo, propiedad o clase.

trans-unit.source: The process for creating and using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object is as follows:
trans-unit.target: El proceso para crear y usar un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto es como sigue:

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Crear un objeto de atributo que sea adecuado para el objeto que se va a invalidar.

trans-unit.source: For example, to override a field or property, create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, using the new, derived type.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, para reemplazar un campo o propiedad, cree un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, utilizando el nuevo tipo derivado.

trans-unit.source: You can optionally assign a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Namespace%2A> that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, puede asignar un nuevo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Namespace%2A> que invalida el nombre del atributo o espacio de nombres de la clase base.

trans-unit.source: Add the attribute object to the appropriate <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> property or collection.
trans-unit.target: Agregue el objeto de atributo correspondientes <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> propiedad o la colección.

trans-unit.source: For example, you would add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, specifying the member name that is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, agregaría el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> colección de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto Database, especificando el nombre del miembro que se está reemplazando.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method, add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Mediante el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> método, agregue el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> el objeto a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the object being overridden is an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>, you need only to specify the type of the overridden object.
trans-unit.target: Si el objeto que se está reemplazando es un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>, sólo debe especificar el tipo de objeto reemplazado.

trans-unit.source: But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member.
trans-unit.target: Pero si va a reemplazar un campo o propiedad, también debe especificar el nombre del miembro reemplazado.

trans-unit.source: When constructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, pass the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Al construir el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, pasar la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: Use the resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize the derived class objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilice el cuadro <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para serializar o deserializar los objetos de clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Orchestra`, which contains a single field named `Instruments` that returns an array of `Instrument` objects.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Orchestra`, que contiene un solo campo denominado `Instruments` que devuelve una matriz de `Instrument` objetos.

trans-unit.source: A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class.
trans-unit.target: Una segunda clase denominada `Brass` hereda de la `Instrument` clase.

trans-unit.source: The example uses an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> class to override the `Instrument` field, allowing the field to accept `Brass` objects.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo se utiliza una instancia de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> clase para invalidar la `Instrument` campo, lo que permite el campo para aceptar `Brass` objetos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> a la colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: Tipo <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del objeto que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> que representa los atributos reemplazados.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> a la colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter specifies an object to be overridden by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="type" /> especifica un objeto que va a ser reemplazado por el objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto contiene una unión de objetos de atributos que hacen que la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> invalidar su comportamiento de serialización predeterminado para un conjunto de objetos.

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: Elija los objetos de atributo para colocar en el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto, dependiendo de los comportamientos concretos que se desea invalidar.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa un miembro de clase como un elemento XML de forma predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as an XM attribute instead, you would create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Si desea que el miembro se serializa como un atributo XM en su lugar, debe crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, asígnelo a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>y agregue el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> el objeto a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to override an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice esta sobrecarga para reemplazar un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Band` which is derived from a class named `Orchestra`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Band` que se deriva de una clase denominada `Orchestra`.

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> object, and assigns it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlRoot%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo se crea un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> objeto y lo asigna a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlRoot%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo, a continuación, se llama la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> método para agregar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> el objeto a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object to override.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del objeto que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to override.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del miembro que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> que representa los atributos reemplazados.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> a la colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter specifies an object to be overridden.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="type" /> especifica un objeto que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="member" /> parameter specifies the name of a member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="member" /> especifica el nombre de un miembro que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto contiene una unión de objetos de atributos que hacen que la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> invalidar su comportamiento de serialización predeterminado para un conjunto de objetos.

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: Elija los objetos de atributo para colocar en el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto, dependiendo de los comportamientos concretos que se desea invalidar.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa un miembro de clase como un elemento XML de forma predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Si desea que el miembro se serializa como un atributo XML en su lugar, debe crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, asígnelo a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>y agregue el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> el objeto a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when attempting to override an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este método al intentar para reemplazar un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> object, and assigns it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> objeto y lo asigna a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example then adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object, before creating an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo, a continuación, agrega el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> el objeto a una <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto antes de crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto que representa la colección de atributos reemplazados.

trans-unit.source: The base class <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Tipo <see cref="T:System.Type" /> de la clase base que está asociado a la colección de atributos que se desea recuperar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified, base-class, type.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto asociado al tipo de clase base especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> que representa la colección de atributos de reemplazo.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object that contains attributes for an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilice esta sobrecarga para devolver un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto que contiene los atributos de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object contains objects that override an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlEnumAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, you must use the overload that specifies the overridden member as well as the type.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto contiene objetos que reemplazan un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlEnumAttribute>, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, debe utilizar la sobrecarga que especifique el miembro reemplazado así como el tipo.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object, an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, and an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> object.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto y un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example assigns the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, and adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo se asigna el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlRoot%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> y la agrega la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> el objeto a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Lastly, the example gets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object by passing the <xref:System.Type> of the serialized class to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Por último, en el ejemplo se obtiene la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto pasando el <xref:System.Type> de la clase serializada para el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Type> is `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En este ejemplo, el <xref:System.Type> es `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The base class <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want.
trans-unit.target: Tipo <see cref="T:System.Type" /> de la clase base que está asociado a la colección de atributos que se desea.

trans-unit.source: The name of the overridden member that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> to return.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del miembro reemplazado que especifica el objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> que se va a devolver.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base-class) type.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto asociado al tipo (de clase base) especificado.

trans-unit.source: The member parameter specifies the base-class member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro de miembro especifica el miembro de clase base que se reemplaza.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> que representa la colección de atributos de reemplazo.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object that contains objects that override an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice esta sobrecarga para devolver un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto que contiene objetos que reemplazan un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlEnumAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object contains an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>, you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto contiene un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>, debe utilizar la sobrecarga que especifique sólo el tipo reemplazado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object, an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>, and an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> object.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>y un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example assigns the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object and adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo se asigna el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> y la agrega la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> el objeto a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Lastly, the example gets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object by passing the <xref:System.Type> of the serialized class and member name to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Por último, en el ejemplo se obtiene la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto pasando el <xref:System.Type> del nombre de clase y miembro serializado para la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.
